title: Farhan Akhtar:‘My First Legit Boxing Injury’! Farhan Akhtar Suffers Hairline Fracture On Toofan Sets, Shares Photo
text:
Farhan Akhtar is reuniting with Rakeysh Omprakash Mehra, the director who gave the movie buffs the National Award-winning sports biopic Bhaag Milkha Bhaag, for yet another sports movie. This time, after six years, Farhan Akhtar will play the role of a fictional character, a boxer.

Twitter

Farhan, whose The Sky is Pink alongside Priyanka Chopra has just released, has been prepping up for the role quite religiously. He has sported a chiselled body and has been practicing air punches for quite some time now. The first look of Toofan was released a couple of days.

Now, in an Instagram post, Farhan Akhtar revealed that while shooting for a scene in the movie, he suffered an injury. The 45-year-old star shared the photo of his x-ray revealing that he is suffering from an hairline fracture. Taking pride in that, Farhan wrote, my first legit boxing injury.

Instagram

“When nature plays Tetris .. and yup, that’s my first legit boxing injury .. a hairline fracture on the hamate (courtesy @kongkoul 🙏🏼)found among the carpal bones of the hand,” he wrote.

Instagram

Apart from Farhan Akhtar, Toofan will also feature Paresh Rawal. The veteran actor will be seen essaying the role of a boxing coach. Directed by Rakeysh Omprakash Mehra, the sports drama is co-produced by him along with Ritesh Sidhwani and Farhan Akhtar. Also starring Mrunal Thakur, Toofan is slated to hit the screens on Oct 2, 2020.
